title: A Digitalized Atlas for Pulmonary Airway
authors: Minghui Zhang, Chenyu Li, Hanxiao Zhang, Yaoyu Liu and Yun Gu
abstract:
In this work, we proposed AirwayAtlas, which is an end-to-end pipeline for
automatic extraction of airway anatomies with lobar, segmental and subsegmental
labeling. A compact representation, AirwaySign, is generated based on diverse
features of airway branches. Experiments on multi-center datasets validated the
effectiveness of AirwayAtlas. We also demonstrated that AirwaySign is a
powerful tool for correlation analysis on pulmonary diseases.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Image and Video Processing
Computer Science/Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
